Text: email to HeatherRichard FYI Heather asked to me send her an email requesting the information since it is confidential Mary

RE CEC Renewable Filings Cc Thank you Jesse I will submit the corrected proof of purchase to the CEC for EEMCs filing and make sure Jason has everything he needs Thanks again Mary Original Message From Bryson Jesse Sent Monday September PM To Hannusch Mary Cc Ring Richard Subject CEC Renewable Filings Mary Jason Orta from the CEC called me to inform us that one of the generator numbers we had used was wrong Sierra Pacific was listed as CEC and should actually have been I have made this correction in EPMIs CEC filing and resubmitted it I have also made the correction on the Proof of Purchase for Monthly Performance Reports that you sent to me I faxed the corrected version back to you at If you have any questions let me know Regards Jesse

Request for Trueup calculations Cc Heather I am in receipt of a letter from you addressed to Richard Ring dated September Richard has asked me to verify the trueup calculation shown on the letter Therefore will you please provide copies of the spreadsheets that show how you arrived at the calculation Thank you very much Mary Hannusch

FW Junes MPRSorry Richard I forgot the attachments Original Message From Hannusch Mary Sent Monday September AM To Ring Richard Subject Junes MPR Richard Attached are the reports for EES and EEMC I have added the Julys purchases we removed from last months report I am waiting to get EEMCs sales figures Did you receive the BizMix and Fetzer reports from Annette Tafallo last month I have left her several phone messages and she has not returned my call
EEMC PurchasesRichard Attached is the same spreadsheet I sent earlier Click on the EEMC tab for EEMC purchases
Green Purchases AnalysisHi Richard Please call me if you have any questions Thanks Mary
August MPRsHi Richard Will you please look over the attached MPRs and let me know if they look okay Thanks Mary

Patagonia Consumption Cc Richard Attached is the Patagonia consumption data I have it sorted and totaled by From Date Because of the meter read dates it is difficult to get a clear cut consumption by month If you would like me to change the subtotals just let me know Mary

Green Credit SpreadsheetsRichard Attached please find two spreadsheets One reflects the sales and purchases filed for years and and the other provides the checks received from the CEC If you have any questions please let me know Also please let me know what else I may help you with Thanks Mary
EEMC PurchasesRichard Attached is the same spreadsheet I sent earlier Click on the EEMC tab for EEMC purchases
Green Purchases AnalysisHi Richard Please call me if you have any questions Thanks Mary
